title: Various T206s for sale --cards added 2/09 and prices dropped
author: Kenny Cole

posts.post_title: Various T206s for sale --cards added 2/09 and prices dropped
posts.post_content:
Prices are delivered.  Paypal FF or add 3% please.  Checks and money orders fine too, but checks must clear.  Thank you for looking.

1909 Sweet Caporal 150 Hahn SGC60 - sold
1910 Cycle 350 Merritt SGC 50 - $120
1910 Piedmont 350 Kelley SGC 40 - $90
1910 Piedmont 350 Huggins Hands at Mouth SGC 40 - sold
1910 Sweet Caporal 350 Doyle With Bat SGC 60 - $130
1909-11 El Principe de Gales Barbeau SGC 50 - $120
1909-11 Old Mill Southern League Bay SGC 40 - $150
1910-11 Lenox Bell Follow Through SGC 10 - sold
1911 Sweet Caporal 460 Wheat SGC 40 - sold
Some great cards there Kenny, GLWS
